title: FieldSkipMap
description: Skips field mapping for a specific target field, effectively leaving the field unchanged during migration.

applyTo.description: A list of Work Item Types that this Field Map will apply to. If the list is empty it will apply to all Work Item Types. You can use "*" to apply to all Work Item Types.

targetField.description: Gets or sets the name of the target field that should be skipped during migration, resetting it to its original value.
